title: Java Programming
subtitle: Object-oriented programming with Java for scalable applications

topics.description: History, features of Java, JDK, JVM, and basic syntax.

topics.title: Data Types and Variables

topics.description: Thread class, Runnable interface, thread lifecycle, synchronization.
